content: the stocking pattern was advertised in woman s home companion in november 1945 page 25 notes from the pattern **size ** 20 inches 51cm from top of stocking to heel 8½ inches 21½cm from toe to heel **materials ** 4 oz knitting worsted in each of red white and green small amount of blue 3 75mm straight needles or needles to obtain gauge 1 set of 3 75mm dpns 15-18 small round sequins 3 star shaped sequins if desired the knitting-and com sample was knit with dk yarn and 4mm needles
